LanguageData.VMM_MeleeParryAngle.label: Effective Melee Parry Angle (degrees)
LanguageData.VMM_MeleeParryAngle.description: This stat defines the maximum angle within which a pawn can attempt to parry incoming melee attacks. For example, with a value of 90, the pawn will only attempt to parry melee attacks within a 90Â° arc in front of them. At a minimum value of 0, the pawn will be unable to parry any attacks. At the maximum value of 360, the pawn can attempt to parry melee attacks from any direction.
